## Tools

- [{{< fa toolbox >}} Kraken 2](https://ccb.jhu.edu/software/kraken2/) Taxonomic classification system 
- [{{< fa toolbox >}} SortMeRNA](https://bioinfo.lifl.fr/RNA/sortmerna/) Filtering, mapping and OTU picking 
- [{{< fa toolbox >}} SourMash](https://sourmash.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) Compare sequence similarity between datasets 
- [{{< fa toolbox >}} MetaPhlAn 2](https://huttenhower.sph.harvard.edu/metaphlan2/) Taxonomy quantitation / Community profiling 
- [{{< fa toolbox >}} HUMAnN 2](https://huttenhower.sph.harvard.edu/humann2/) Functional quantitation
